title: Dashboard - recent evals, pass/fail rates, trends
description: Build the main dashboard page showing recent evaluations, pass/fail rates, and trend visualizations. This is the landing page users see when they open the app.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard shows list of recent evaluation runs with status (pass/fail/running)
Pass/fail rate summary displayed prominently (percentage, counts)
Trend chart showing pass rates over time (last 7/30 days)
Quick filters: by status, by suite, by date range
Links to individual eval run details
Loading states and empty states handled
Responsive layout works on desktop and tablet
Uses existing tRPC endpoints for data fetching

deliverables.summary: Enhanced dashboard with filters, trend chart, and two-column layout. Added date range quick filters (7d/30d/90d/all), expandable filters panel for status and suite filtering, and integrated ScoreTrendChart in a new TrendCard component.
